scripts.console-api:split: mkdir -p tmp/split && openapi split tmp/console_oapi3.json --outDir tmp/split
scripts.console-api:integrate: mkdir -p openapi/paths/ && cp tmp/split/components/schemas/*.yaml openapi/components/schemas/ && cp tmp/split/paths/*.yaml openapi/paths/
scripts.console-api:clean: git checkout openapi && git clean -fd openapi
